full_text: Screened by NARA, 9/21/2023 NOTE-0-GRAM CTHE DRAWING BOARD BOX 505 . DALLAS, TEX F. DE NECOCHEA PUBLIC ACCOUNTANT 213 SECOND STREET, SUITE 225 CALEXICO, CALIFORNIA 92231 PHONE 357-3370 MESSAGE TO U S Immigration Service SUBJECT Ramon Wong Fong Song Morelos 251, 300 No. L. A. Street Mexicali, Baja California Los Angeles, California DATE 10-3-67 Gentlemen: On July 19, 1967 / sent you Form 575 (A & B) certified by the U S Department of Labor and Petition Form (1-140) sponsored by my client Mr. T. H. Loo, 452 Main Street, EL Centro, California. As of this date Mr. Wong Fong Song has had no communication from your office or the American Consulate at Tijuana, and is wondering whether the documents will become very old if you do not take action at once. Your considerations and reply will be greatly appreciated. cc. U. S. Consul Respectfully yours, P. O. Box 1358 San Ysidro, California BY REPLY DATE SIGNED Form NO-R113 c The Drawing Board, Inc., Box 505, Dollar Texas INSTRUCTIDNS TO RECEIVER: INSTRUCTIONS TO BENDER:
